entry.title: dns验证方式使用letsencrypt证书
entry.content: 全站HTTPS支持安装acme.sh自动安装到~/.acme.sh/文件夹,会创建crontab，检测证书是否过期1curl https://get.acme.sh | sh开启脚本自动更新1acme.sh --upgrade --auto-upgrade生成证书使用阿里云解析api自动添加txt解析记录123export Ali_Key="***"export Ali_Secret="***"acme.sh --issue --dns dns_ali -d example.com解析生效后重新生成证书1acme.sh --renew -d example.com安装证书1234acme.sh --installcert -d example.com \ --key-file /home/<id>/letsencrypt/<id>.key \ --fullchain-file /home/<id>/letsencrypt/<id>.cer \ --reloadcmd "service nginx force-reload"nginx更改配置ssl_certificate 对应 fullchain-filessl_certificate_key 对应 –key-file1service nginx reload链接acme.shssllabsdns查询aliyun密钥

entry.title: 开放地图上标注公司信息
entry.content: 利用百度的开放地图标注公司信息这里记录一下过程申请百度地图API密钥注册示例提取百度坐标利用百度地图工具拾取坐标系统123456var point1 = new BMap.Point(116.156346,28.34574); //进贤养护所var point2 = new BMap.Point(116.035085,28.805284); //南新养护站var point3 = new BMap.Point(116.284881,28.048271); //临川养护站var point4 = new BMap.Point(115.8309,27.99897); //洛市养护站var point5 = new BMap.Point(116.19117,27.589782); //宜黄养护站var point6 = new BMap.Point(115.290875,27.224466); //乌江养护站初始化地图默认显示全部点123var map = new BMap.Map("allmap", {minZoom:9,maxZoom:16});map.centerAndZoom(point1,9);map.enableScrollWheelZoom(true);添加自定义控件左上角添加控件，可返回初始化页面1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526function ZoomControl(){ this.defaultAnchor = BMAP_ANCHOR_TOP_LEFT; this.defaultOffset = new BMap.Size(10, 10);}ZoomControl.prototype = new BMap.Control();ZoomControl.prototype.initialize = function(map){ var div = document.createElement("div"); div.appendChild(document.createTextNode("进贤养护所")); // 设置样式 div.style.cursor = "pointer"; div.style.border = "2px solid white"; div.style.color = "#FFFFFF"; div.style.backgroundColor = "red"; // 绑定事件 div.onclick = function(e){ map.centerAndZoom(point1,9); } // 添加DOM元素到地图中 map.getContainer().appendChild(div); // 将DOM元素返回 return div;}// 创建控件var myZoomCtrl = new ZoomControl();map.addControl(myZoomCtrl);添加点标注将所站标注出来，单击可放大页面可显示图文组合的信息窗口12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152535455function attribute(e){ var p = e.target; map.centerAndZoom(p.getPosition(),16);}var marker1 = new BMap.Marker(point1);var label1= new BMap.Label("进贤养护所",{offset:new BMap.Size(20,-10)});marker1.setLabel(label1);marker1.setAnimation(BMAP_ANIMATION_BOUNCE); //跳动的动画marker1.addEventListener("click",function(){ map.centerAndZoom(point1,16); var content1 = "<h4 style='margin:0 0 5px 0;padding:0.2em 0'>进贤养护所</h4>" + "<img style='float:right;margin:4px' id='imgDemo' src='https://ccq.oss-cn-qingdao.aliyuncs.com/images/jxyhs-min.jpg' width='139' height='104' title='进贤养护所'/>" + "<p style='margin:0;line-height:1.5;font-size:13px'> 地址：江西省进贤县沥背陈家</p>" + "</div>"; var infoWindow = new BMap.InfoWindow(content1); this.openInfoWindow(infoWindow); document.getElementById('imgDemo').onload = function (){ infoWindow.redraw(); }});map.addOverlay(marker1); //添加点1var marker2 = new BMap.Marker(point2);var label2 = new BMap.Label("南新养护站",{offset:new BMap.Size(20,-10)});marker2.setLabel(label2);marker2.addEventListener("click",attribute);map.addOverlay(marker2); //添加点2var marker3 = new BMap.Marker(point3);var label3 = new BMap.Label("临川养护站",{offset:new BMap.Size(20,-10)});marker3.setLabel(label3);marker3.addEventListener("click",attribute);map.addOverlay(marker3); //添加点3var marker4 = new BMap.Marker(point4);var label4 = new BMap.Label("洛市养护站",{offset:new BMap.Size(20,-10)});marker4.setLabel(label4);marker4.addEventListener("click",attribute);map.addOverlay(marker4); //添加点4var marker5 = new BMap.Marker(point5);var label5 = new BMap.Label("宜黄养护站",{offset:new BMap.Size(20,-10)});marker5.setLabel(label5);marker5.addEventListener("click",attribute);map.addOverlay(marker5); //添加点5var marker6 = new BMap.Marker(point6);var label6 = new BMap.Label("乌江养护站",{offset:new BMap.Size(20,-10)});marker6.setLabel(label6);marker6.addEventListener("click",attribute);map.addOverlay(marker6); //添加点6效果

entry.title: 找出照片拍摄地点的公路桩号
entry.content: 道路巡查时拍了些照片，但没记录公路桩号这里提供一种思路Goole Earth提取参考点的坐标某高速K50+000~K51+000区间的11个百米桩的GPS坐标1234567891011raw_data = [("28°0'22.49", "115°49'4.92"),\ ("28°0'19.41", "115°49'3.68"),\ ("28°0'16.34", "115°49'2.56"),\ ("28°0'13.17", "115°49'1.56"),\ ("28°0'10.02", "115°49'0.58"),\ ("28°0'6.89", "115°48'59.73"),\ ("28°0'3.74", "115°48'58.99"),\ ("28°0'0.50", "115°48'58.30"),\ ("27°59'57.31", "115°48'57.65"),\ ("27°59'54.10", "115°48'56.93"),\ ("27°59'50.88", "115°48'56.26")]弧度转十进制1234567891011121314151617def radian_to_decimal(d): du_1=d.find("°") du=d[:du_1] fen_1=d.find("'") fen=d[du_1+1:fen_1] miao=d[fen_1+1:] return round(float(du)+float(fen)/60+float(miao)/3600, 6)def make_gps_data(): result = [] for i in range(len(raw_data)): id = i + 1 chaiage = 50000 + i * 100 lon = radian_to_decimal(raw_data[i][1]) lat = radian_to_decimal(raw_data[i][0]) result.append({"id":id, "chainage":chaiage, "lon":lon, "lat":lat}) return result二分查找最近的两个参考点该路线为南北走向，参考点的纬度数值属递减数列可用二分查找算法找出最近的两个纬度数值123456789101112def search(li, find): low = 0 high = len(li) - 1 while high - low > 1: mid = int((low + high) / 2) if li[mid]["lat"] == find[1]: return mid elif li[mid]["lat"] > find[1]: low = mid else: high = mid return [low, high]计算地图上两点经纬度间的距离Python版本的haversine()函数12345678910from math import radians, cos, sin, asin, sqrtdef haversine(lon1, lat1, lon2, lat2): lon1, lat1, lon2, lat2 = map(radians, [lon1, lat1, lon2, lat2]) dlon = lon2 - lon1 dlat = lat2 - lat1 a = sin(dlat/2)**2 + cos(lat1) * cos(lat2) * sin(dlon/2)**2 c = 2 * asin(sqrt(a)) r = 6371 return c * r * 1000求得目标桩号目标与最近两个参考点的距离可换算出两个桩号，取平均值1234567891011find = [115.816236, 28.000358]li = gps_datalow, high = search(li, find)dis1 = haversine(li[low]["lon"], li[low]["lat"], find[0], find[1])chainage1 = li[low]["chainage"] + dis1dis2 = haversine(li[high]["lon"], li[high]["lat"], find[0], find[1])chainage2 = li[high]["chainage"] - dis2result = int(round((chainage1 + chainage2) / 2))print(u"实际桩号: 50675")print(u"测算桩号: %s" %(result))print(u"偏差: %s" %(abs(result-50675)))图例
